snippet: A counseling group in New Jersey that promised to help men overcome homosexual attractions has agreed to shut down permanently in a settlement.
abstract: New Jersey counseling group that offered so-called conversion therapy for men who wished to overcome homosexual attraction agrees to shut down permanently, part of settlement reached with four men who say they were misled by group.
lead_paragraph: A counseling group in New Jersey that promised to help men overcome homosexual attractions has agreed to shut down permanently in a settlement.

headline.main: New Jersey: Gay Conversion Therapy Group to Close
headline.print_headline: New Jersey: Gay Conversion Therapy Group to Close
